rev.desc.rev.desc: view.define RAD cleanup.lists panel is adding records from different modules to inboxes list
Date fields in the FilterEditForm do not retain their values
add the following line to the the panel setup.display:

if (null(fieldlist in $L.view) or lng(denull(fieldlist in $L.view))=0) then ($L.view.format=jscall("convertToRelatedObjectCaptions.getDefaultFormat", inbox.type in $L.view);if (index("$", $L.view.format)>0) then ($L.inbox.default.format=evaluate(parse($L.view.format, 2))+".g") else ($L.inbox.default.format=$L.view.format+".g");fieldlist in $L.view=jscall("convertToRelatedObjectCaptions.getColumnsFromFormat", $L.inbox.default.format))
added the following line to the set.position panel:
This fixes the issue for when you go to a queue that has no views defined...no longer get the 'null' datadict error.

descript.descript: view.define RAD cleanup.lists panel is adding records from different modules to inboxes list
Date fields in the FilterEditForm do not retain their values
add the following line to the the panel setup.display:

if (null(fieldlist in $L.view) or lng(denull(fieldlist in $L.view))=0) then ($L.view.format=jscall("convertToRelatedObjectCaptions.getDefaultFormat", inbox.type in $L.view);if (index("$", $L.view.format)>0) then ($L.inbox.default.format=evaluate(parse($L.view.format, 2))+".g") else ($L.inbox.default.format=$L.view.format+".g");fieldlist in $L.view=jscall("convertToRelatedObjectCaptions.getColumnsFromFormat", $L.inbox.default.format))
added the following line to the set.position panel:
This fixes the issue for when you go to a queue that has no views defined...no longer get the 'null' datadict error.
